channel.title: Ok, serious issue, cmon would ya stop being annyoing?!
channel.description: OK, GUYS, CAN SOME1 HELP ME??!? I WANNA ADD A TRADE/PK/DROP TIMER SO THAT NEW PLAYERS CANT TRADE/DROP/PK FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TIME, 60MINS IS GOOD. Sorry, i was joking, god, but please help me? i need help, and demon, please help, anyone help PLZZZZZ idfc if its a link, quick tut, etc, just tell me how, PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1 Thank you all ~~WaleedScape~~

item.title: Ok, serious issue, cmon would ya stop being annyoing?!
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

yeah, but ppl can Xlog, and i have no idea how to fix it
i would’ve reduced starter ammount, but people can STILL Xlog and trade items

Read full topic
item.source: Ok, serious issue, cmon would ya stop being annyoing?!

item.title: Ok, serious issue, cmon would ya stop being annyoing?!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Aeolian, post:14, topic:339748”][quote author=Aeolian. link=topic=436124.msg3203787#msg3203787 date=1273602288]
Mabey you should look in the tutorial section
[/quote]

Maybe you should quit stealing usernames fucker.[/quote]Lol’d.

[quote=“Si Force, post:13, topic:339748”]Maybe you all can stop being ignorant and lazy people and actually help him? This is a help section, not where you just post to say “look in the tutorial section”, and if there is actually a tutorial on what he needs, you could do the good deed of linking him to it.

@Topic poster: My honest recommendation is not to add a timer, as it’ll have a negative effect on your server.[/quote]I didn’t understand exactly what he wanted :S

But I totally agree, rather than adding a timer, I recommend lowering your starter amount, that way people wont take the time to get it.

Read full topic

Maybe you all can stop being ignorant and lazy people and actually help him? This is a help section, not where you just post to say “look in the tutorial section”, and if there is actually a tutorial on what he needs, you could do the good deed of linking him to it.

@Topic poster: My honest recommendation is not to add a timer, as it’ll have a negative effect on your server.
